text: This is a list of the winners of, and nominees for, the Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Animated Movie, given at the Nickelodeon Kids' Choice Awards. It was first awarded in 2006. (NOTE: Year refers to year of eligibility, the actual ceremonies are held the following year) The winners are listed in bold. {| class="wikitable sortable" |-align="center" ! bgcolor="#ff7f00"|Year ! bgcolor="#00ff00" |Winner ! bgcolor="#ff7f00" |Nominees |- ! scope="row"|2006 | Madagascar | *Chicken Little *Robots *Wallace & Gromit: The Curse of the Were-Rabbit |- ! scope="row"|2007 | Happy Feet | *Cars *Ice Age: The Meltdown *Over the Hedge |- ! scope="row"|2008 | Ratatouille | *Bee Movie *Shrek the Third *The Simpsons Movie |- ! scope="row"|2009 | Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa | *Bolt *Kung Fu Panda *WALL-E |- ! scope="row"|2010 | Up | *A Christmas Carol *Ice Age: Dawn of the Dinosaurs *Monsters vs. Aliens |- ! scope="row"|2011 | Despicable Me | *How to Train Your Dragon *Shrek Forever After *Toy Story 3 |- ! scope="row"|2012 | Puss in Boots | *Cars 2 *Kung Fu Panda 2 *Rio |- ! scope="row"|2013 | Wreck-It Ralph | *Brave *Ice Age: Continental Drift *Madagascar 3: Europe's Most Wanted |- ! scope="row"|2014 | Frozen | *Cloudy with a Chance of Meatballs 2 *Despicable Me 2 *Monsters University |- ! scope="row"|2015 | Big Hero 6 | *The SpongeBob Movie: Sponge Out of Water *How to Train Your Dragon 2 *The Lego Movie *Penguins of Madagascar *Rio 2 |- ! scope="row"|2016 | Hotel Transylvania 2 | *Alvin and the Chipmunks: The Road Chip *Home *Inside Out *Minions *The Peanuts Movie |- ! scope="row"|2017 | Finding Dory | *Moana *The Secret Life of Pets *Sing *Trolls *Zootopia |- ! scope="row"|2018 | Coco | *Captain Underpants: The First Epic Movie *Cars 3 *Despicable Me 3 *The Emoji Movie *Ferdinand *The Lego Batman Movie *Smurfs: The Lost Village |- ! scope="row"|2019 | Incredibles 2 | * The Grinch * Hotel Transylvania 3: Summer Vacation * Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse * Peter Rabbit * Ralph Breaks the Internet |- ! title: Kids' Choice Award for Favorite Animated Movie
